IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE LIFE-SUSTAINING NUTRITION TO PEOPLE WITH HIV/AIDS, CANCER & OTHER ILLNESSES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FOSTER A COMMUNITY CARING FOR THOSE LIVING WITH HIV/AIDS, CANCER AND OTHER LIFE-CHALLENGING ILLNESSES BY PREPARING AND DELIVERING SPECIALIZED MEALS AND GROCERIES ALONG WITH NUTRITION COUNSELING.
IRS990.Desc: IN 2015, FOOD & FRIENDS' STAFF AND OVER 9,000 VOLUNTEERS PROVIDED OVER 1,016,000 SPECIALIZED MEALS THROUGH OUR HOME-DELIVERED MEALS SERVICE AND GROCERIES-TO-GO SERVICE TO 2,700 CHILDREN, MEN AND WOMEN LIVING WITH HIV/AIDS, CANCER AND OTHER LIFE CHALLENGING ILLNESSES AND THEIR CAREGIVERS AND DEPENDENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: IN 2015, FOOD & FRIENDS' COMMUNITY DIETICIANS PROVIDED NEARLY 1,200 NUTRITION COUNSELING SESSIONS, PROVIDING INDIVIDUAL NUTRITION COUNSELING TO FOOD & FRIENDS CLIENTS AND OTHER IN THE COMMUNITY LIVING WITH LIFE CHALLENGING ILLNESSES. NUTRITION COUNSELING TYPICALLY INCLUDES A FULL ASSESSMENT OF BODY COMPOSITION AND DIET ANALYSIS AND IN-DEPTH NUTRITION EDUCATION TAILORED TO EACH CLIENT'S NEEDS. THESE SERVICES ARE FREE OF CHARGE TO RECIPIENTS AND INCLUDE HANDS-ON COOKING CLASSES AND SEMINARS ON A HOST OF NUTRITION TOPICS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE ENDOWMENT FUND ARE TO BE HELD INDEFINITELY (UNLESS BOARD RESTRICTED). THE INCOME GENERATED IS TO BE EXPENDED TO SUPPORT THE ORGANIZATION'S PROGRAMS INCLUDING DIRECT SERVICE, FOOD & FOOD DELIVERY, EDUCATION & ADVOCACY, VOLUNTEERISM & COMMUNITY SUPPORT, AND GREATEST NEEDS.

THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES THAT A TAX POSITION BE RECOGNIZED OR DERECOGNIZED BASED ON A "MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT" THRESHOLD. THIS APPLIES TO TAX POSITIONS TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT BELIEVE ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS INCLUDE, OR REFLECT, ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS.

IRS990ScheduleG.GamingManagerServicesProvTxt: DEPUTY EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING. IN ADDITION FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE PRESIDENT AND/OR TREASURER BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO FULLY DISCLOSE TO THEIR SUPERVISOR OR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR DISCLOSES TO THE BOARD PRESIDENT ANY SITUATION IN WHICH A CONFLICT OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT EXISTS OR COULD ARISE. BOARD MEMBERS ANNUALLY COMPLETE AND RETURN TO THE ORGANIZATION A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT INDICATING ANY ISSUES. THESE FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND MAINTAINED BY THE HR DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND ITS COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEW AND APPROVE COMPENSATION WITH THE AID OF A COMPENSATION STUDY COMPLETED BY A NEUTRAL, INDEPENDENT CONSULTANT WHO SPECIALIZES IN NONPROFIT COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST OF SUCH DOCUMENTS BY THE MEMBER OF THE PUBLIC.
FORM 990, PART XII, LINE 2C: THE BOARD ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
